sentence.Network_en: Owen had the habit of staring motionlessly at his interlocutor.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧文谈话时有一动不动、目不转睛地盯着对方的习惯。

sentence.Network_en: Sailboats glided motionlessly across the lake.
sentence.Network_cn: 帆船静静地像滑动似的在湖上前进.

list.abs: 不要让我期待得太久 Don't keep me in an endless wait静静蛰伏 While motionlessly you hibernate不敢在阳光下 Afraid that the profusion of your songs
She sat motionlessly with horror ., 她惊恐地呆坐着.
jiānglì[stand straight motionlessly] 直立不动僵立倚壁。――清·邵长蘅《青门剩稿》

means.word_mean: 1. without moving; in a motionless manner;

sentences.sentence: "he saw the black-haired man waiting motionlessly behind the opposite side of the platform"
